title: DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT (dwrite_1.h)
description: The DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT enumeration contains values that specify the ratio between the width and height of the character face.
ms.keywords: DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT enumeration [Direct Write], DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_ANY, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_CONDENSED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_EXTENDED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_MONOSPACED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_NORMAL, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_NO_FIT, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_SUPER_CONDENSED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_SUPER_EXTENDED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_VERY_CONDENSED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_VERY_EXTENDED, directwrite.dwrite_panose_aspect, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_ANY, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_CONDENSED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_EXTENDED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_MONOSPACED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_NORMAL, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_NO_FIT, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_SUPER_CONDENSED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_SUPER_EXTENDED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_VERY_CONDENSED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_VERY_EXTENDED
